title: 1 Bedroom Plus Den in Westwood ~ EV Charging Stations ~ $1,500 OFF M/I
posting_body: Perfect for up to four Occupants.
Also 5 Occupants are okay with an additional $300 per month.
Welcome to The Kelton Arms apartments where quality and comfort meet in the heart of beautiful Westwood.
Our prime location is a short walk to UCLA, shopping, and enticing restaurants.
The Kelton Arms reaches out to students of UCLA to provide style and comfort at an ideal location!
There is no need to fight for parking as you will leave your car in our underground gated parking garage and stroll to campus or into the Village in just a few minutes.
Our apartment homes boast spacious living areas, extra large rooms, huge closets, fully equipped kitchens, central air conditioning and heating, and private balconies.
Many of our units contain fireplaces and wet bars.
Visit our community today and see why The Kelton Arms Apartments is the ideal place to call home!
Perfect for work from home set ups!
Our community offers large floor plans with extra space for your desk, bright natural lighting, quiet and tranquil community spaces, and fast Internet options from multiple providers.
- Easy Access to Freeways and Shopping
Price & availability are subject to change.
Square footage may not be exact.
UCLA, Century City, Sawtelle, Westgate, Beverly Hills, West Los Angeles, Brentwood
